wordGroup: infiltration rate 渗滤速率；渗透速率；下渗率，渗润率
infiltration capacity 渗入能力；渗透容量
air infiltration 空气渗透；漏风

sentences.en: I've set up rain barrels and infiltration pits to collect thousands of gallons of storm water cascading from my roof.
sentences.cn: 我设置了雨桶和渗透坑来收集从屋顶倾泻而下的数千加仑雨水。

sentences.en: CT scan plays an important role in finding pericolic infiltration, distal ileal involvement and lymphadenopathy.
sentences.cn: CT 扫描在发现心包浸润、远端回肠受累和淋巴结病变中起重要作用。

sentences.en: The typical manifestations of PCP were bilateral diffuse infiltration distributing in perihilar regions.
sentences.cn: PCP 的典型表现是双肺弥漫性渗出性病变分布于肺门周围。
